    namespace   = "my-namespace"

# f5distributedcloud_network_policy (Resource)

The `f5distributedcloud_network_policy` resource manages Network Policies in F5 Distributed Cloud.

Network Policies define traffic rules for controlling network connectivity between workloads.

## Example Usage

```hcl
resource "f5distributedcloud_network_policy" "example" {
  name        = "network-policy"
  namespace   = "my-namespace"
  policy_type = "INGRESS"

  rules {
    name          = "allow-web"
    action        = "ALLOW"
    source_prefix = "10.0.0.0/8"
    protocol      = "TCP"
    ports         = "80,443"
  }
}
```



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String)
- `namespace` (String)

### Optional

- `description` (String)
- `policy_type` (String) Type of network policy (INGRESS/EGRESS).
- `rules` (Block List) Network policy rules. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--rules))

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.

<a id="nestedblock--rules"></a>
### Nested Schema for `rules`

Required:

- `action` (String) Action to take (ALLOW/DENY).
- `name` (String) Name of the rule.

Optional:

- `dest_prefix` (String) Destination IP prefix (CIDR).
- `ports` (String) Port numbers (comma-separated or range).
- `protocol` (String) Protocol (TCP/UDP/ICMP).
- `source_prefix` (String) Source IP prefix (CIDR).
